  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    Direct Known Subclasses:

    public abstract class AbstractUpgradeStep
extends Object
implements UpgradeStep
    An abstract class that provides utility methods for upgrade steps.

      • getRealmNames

        protected Set<String> getRealmNames()
                             throws UpgradeException
        Returns the names of the realms available in the OpenAM configuration. The returned set is ordered, so the realm hierarchy maintained (i.e. subrealm precedes sub-subrealm).
        Returns:
        The set of realmnames available in OpenAM.
        Throws:
        UpgradeException - In case retrieving the realmnames was not successful.

      • getConnection

        protected final org.forgerock.opendj.ldap.Connection getConnection()
                                                            throws DataLayerException
        Acquires an LDAP connection against the configuration store.
        Returns:
        An LDAP connection object set up based on the configuration store settings.
        Throws:
        DataLayerException - If there was a problem establishing a connection to a valid server.
